General.Name: Jiangsu Smartwin Electronics Technology Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Jiangsu Smartwin Electronics Technology Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells liquid crystal display and display modules in China. The company offers TN, HTN, FSTN, FFSTN, COG, COB, TABLCM products. Its products are used in information display terminals, such as mobile phones, industrial equipment, household appliances, and terminal equipment. The company was formerly known as Jurong Juncheng Electronics Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jiangsu Smartwin Electronics Technology Co.,Ltd in October 2015. Jiangsu Smartwin Electronics Technology Co.,Ltd was founded in 1994 and is based in Jurong, China.
